name: ウーマンコミュニケーション
name_original: ウーマンコミュニケーション
description:
Sorry, this game is not yet translated into English.
If you would like to play the English version, please add it to your wishlist and wait.
We will let you know when it is translated!

----

Welcome to the world of inadvertent lewd language adventures!

It often happens that lewd words are inadvertently made up in conversation, doesn't it?
This game is probably the world's first adventure game where you will find such "inadvertent lewd words" to advance the game!

Game Introduction.
  • High-speed lewd word action.
    Find the lewd words quickly from the nonstop stream of words on the screen!
    Your score is determined by the number, speed and accuracy of the words you find.
    This is a unique game system that offers thrilling action.

  • It doesn't end with just a silly game. A surprising and moving multi-end story!
    The story begins when you join the Public Discipline Committee.
    You will be the newest member of the Public Discipline Committee, and you will be in charge of controlling the "careless and lewd language" that infests the school and its surroundings.
    What's the point of doing that?

    And this game has multiple endings.
    Why does such a stupid game have multiple endings?　You may be wondering why such a silly game has multiple endings.
    Depending on your actions, your future will change in various ways.
    I wish you the best ending.
